articles.author: Katie Hunt, CNN
articles.title: Tyrannosaurus rex may have been misunderstood - CNN
articles.description: Few dinosaurs exude the same mystique as Tyrannosaurus rex but the tyrant lizard king that once roamed across North America might have been misunderstood.
articles.content:
(CNN)Few dinosaurs exude the same mystique as Tyrannosaurus rex, but the tyrant lizard king that once roamed across North America might have been misunderstood.
